channel.title: Accusation glitch
channel.description: #### What happened? I was accused while I was a Dead Evil King. It was during the new king election. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It should have been impossible to accuse a dead player. #### Steps to reproduce: Have the Evil king be lynched. Accuse him the next day while selecting the new king #### Comments: Screenshot: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1e-974r0Rk3SEVYyTD1vtyRJ6derJifF7/view?usp=sharing

item.title: Accusation glitch
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Not sure if this is related, but sometimes (seemingly randomly) accusations of treason will appear in the chat logs even though someone has already been voted up and is explaining their defense and accusations should be disabled. Are both of these cases a result of lag on the server side?

Read full topic

item.title: Accusation glitch
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
What happened?

I was accused while I was a Dead Evil King. It was during the new king election.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It should have been impossible to accuse a dead player.

Steps to reproduce:

Have the Evil king be lynched.
Accuse him the next day while selecting the new king

Comments:

Screenshot:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1e-974r0Rk3SEVYyTD1vtyRJ6derJifF7/view?usp=sharing

Read full topic
